color.description: The hex value for the background color for the label. Appviews may choose to respect this.

multiple.description: Whether this label can be repeated for a given entity, eg.: [reviewer:foo, reviewer:bar]

name.description: The display name of this label.

scope.description: The areas of the repo this label may apply to, eg.: sh.tangled.repo.issue. Appviews may choose to respect this.

valueType.description: The type definition of this label. Appviews may allow sorting for certain types.

enum.description: Closed set of values that this label can take.

format.description: An optional constraint that can be applied on string concrete types.

type.description: The concrete type of this label's value.
